title: HAT (Hemorrhage After Thrombolysis) Score for Predicting Post-tPA Hemorrhage
desc: The HAT (Hemorrhage After thrombolysis) Score assesses hemorrhage risk after tPA.

orgreference.text: Lou M, Safdar A, Selim M, et. al. The HAT Score: A simple grading scale for predicting hemorrhage after thrombolysis. Neurology. 2008; 71(18): 1417–1423. doi: 10.1212/01.wnl.0000330297.58334.dd
